alert.note: Alert for Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Georgetown and south central Williamsburg Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms near Trio, or 12 miles southeast of Kingstree, moving generally to the south...southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Andrews, Lambert, Trio, Morrisville, Warsaw and Earle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
